result.name: rushmoor-inspire-annex-iii-production-and-industrial-facilities-theme
result.notes:
Data falling under the theme of 'Production and Industrial Facilities' for Rushmoor Borough Council in the INSPIRE legislation

Rushmoor Borough Council INSPIRE WMS Services are licenced under the terms of the Public Sector End User Licence – INSPIRE 

http://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/business-and-government/public-sector/mapping-agreements/inspire-licence.html 

Upon accessing the Licensed Data you will be deemed to have accepted the terms of the Public Sector End User Licence – INSPIRE 

Rushmoor's INSPIRE Annex iii services are still in testing and maybe intermittently available at present (This message will be updated when all issues are resolved)
